title: PathoSyn: Imaging-Pathology MRI Synthesis via Disentangled Deviation Diffusion
summary: We present PathoSyn, a unified generative framework for Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) image synthesis that reformulates imaging-pathology as a disentangled additive deviation on a stable anatomical manifold.
